content:
I'm very excited about the next couple weeks of blog posts.

Next week. I have a new revision of a dataviz that I've done in the past. I'm going to be vague on this until I publish it :blobshh:

I'm working on a post for two weeks that is a new part of a series where I mess around with gRPC. I think I may surprise some people at the direction I go with this.

content:
You know, I've been really enjoying delving into the old-school blogging community. Platforms like neocities and omg.lol just have something special that encourages me to improve my own website just a little more.

It's nice.

reblog.content:
The U.S. government is warning that smart locks securing entry to an estimated 50,000 dwellings nationwide contain hard-coded credentials that can be used to remotely open any of the locks. The lock's maker Chirp Systems remains unresponsive, even though it was first notified about the critical weakness in March 2021. Meanwhile, Chirp's parent company, RealPage, Inc., is being sued by multiple U.S. states for allegedly colluding with landlords to illegally raise rents.

https://krebsonsecurity.com/2024/04/crickets-from-chirp-systems-in-smart-lock-key-leak/

account.note: Independent investigative journalist. Covers cybercrime, security, privacy. Author of 'Spam Nation,' a NYT bestseller. Former Washington Post reporter, '95-'09. Signal: briankrebs.07 Twitter: @briankrebs Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bkrebs/

fields.name: website
fields.value: https://krebsonsecurity.com

media_attachments.description: The Chirp Systems homepage, which says Increase your NOI with automated curb to couch access control, and features a picture of their app running on a mobile phone.

card.title: Crickets from Chirp Systems in Smart Lock Key Leak ‚Äì Krebs on Security

reblog.content: Brits ask ‚ÄúA penny for your thoughts?‚Äù and Americans respond with ‚ÄúJust my two cents‚Äù. At current exchange rates ($1.00 = ¬£0.80) this means Brits are receiving 1.6p of American thoughts for just 1p. In this paper we propose an alternative asset pricing model for the marketplace of ideas, considering‚Äî

card.description: Web APIs are the backbone of the modern web, but the ever-evolving landscape demands a rethink.
